physics.motor: Motor connected to Throat - can initiate action directly
physics.energy_mechanics: Designed to initiate. Creates new directions. Aura pushes others away to create space for initiating.

strategy.name: To Inform
strategy.description: Inform those who will be impacted before you take action
strategy.mechanics: Manifestors are designed to initiate without permission, but their closed aura creates resistance. By informing, they reduce resistance and allow their initiations to land smoothly.
who_to_inform: People directly impacted by your action
examples: 'I'm going to the store' (not asking, informing)
'I'm starting a new project next week' (heads up to team)
'I'm taking Friday off' (inform, don't ask if not required)

signature.name: Peace
signature.description: When living correctly and informing, Manifestors experience peace and freedom to initiate

not_self_theme.name: Anger
not_self_theme.description: When not following Strategy, Manifestors become angry
causes: Others trying to make them respond or wait

failure_states.diagnosis: Not informing, facing constant resistance and control
failure_states.correction: Practice informing before acting. Notice how resistance decreases.
failure_states.experiment: For 7 days, inform everyone impacted before acting. Track anger and resistance levels.

failure_states.diagnosis: Closed aura pushing everyone away, not building bridges through informing
failure_states.correction: Use informing as bridge-building. Creates connection without control.
failure_states.experiment: Inform 3 people per day about your actions. Notice relationship quality improve.

failure_states.diagnosis: Afraid of own impact, suppressing initiation impulse
failure_states.correction: Small initiations with informing. Build trust in own impact.
failure_states.experiment: Initiate one small thing daily with proper informing. Build confidence.

with_generator.dynamics: Manifestor initiates, Generator responds. Natural complementary, but Generator may feel controlled.
with_generator.friction_points: Generator wants Manifestor to wait/respond. Manifestor feels controlled by Generator's need for response.
with_generator.harmony_keys: Manifestor: inform Generator of plans. Generator: let Manifestor initiate without control.

with_manifestor.dynamics: Two initiators. Can create powerful movement together if informing each other.
with_manifestor.friction_points: Both initiating in different directions. Collisions without communication.
with_manifestor.harmony_keys: Inform each other. Give space for independent initiation.

with_projector.dynamics: Two non-energy types understanding each other's needs. Projector can guide Manifestor's impact.
with_projector.friction_points: Projector trying to guide without invitation. Manifestor resisting guidance as control.
with_projector.harmony_keys: Manifestor: invite Projector's perspective when needed. Projector: don't try to control Manifestor.

with_reflector.dynamics: Manifestor initiates, Reflector mirrors impact. Reflector helps Manifestor see effects of initiation.
with_reflector.friction_points: Manifestor's intensity overwhelming Reflector. Reflector's need for time frustrating Manifestor.
with_reflector.harmony_keys: Manifestor: give Reflector space and time. Reflector: appreciate Manifestor's initiating power.

with_manifesting_generator.dynamics: Both can initiate. MG faster but needs to respond. Manifestor pure initiation.
with_manifesting_generator.friction_points: MG trying to initiate like Manifestor. Manifestor frustrated by MG's response needs.
with_manifesting_generator.harmony_keys: Respect different mechanics. Manifestor informs, MG responds then acts.

career_alignment.ideal_work: Starting things, initiating projects, entrepreneurship, independent work

rest_requirements.sleep: Manifestors need alone time before sleep to decompress from impact. 7-8 hours minimum.
rest_requirements.work_rhythm: Bursts of initiation followed by rest periods. Not sustainable 8 hour grind.
rest_requirements.restoration: Alone time essential. Closed aura needs space without others' energy.

communication_style.speaking: Direct, initiating, declarative. Not asking permission, informing of intentions.
communication_style.listening: Can be challenging - naturally initiating rather than receiving
communication_style.decision_making: Depends on Authority. Often quick once clarity comes.

conflict_resolution.pattern: Manifestor anger when controlled, stopped, or resistance is met
conflict_resolution.healthy_approach: Express anger clearly and quickly. Return to peace. Inform more.
conflict_resolution.unhealthy_pattern: Suppress anger, explode eventually, alienate others, increase isolation

core_wound.description: Being controlled, punished for initiating, told to wait or ask permission
core_wound.conditioning: Parents/society trying to control Manifestor child. Shaming initiating impulse.
core_wound.healing: Recognize that informing isn't asking permission. You're free to initiate. Informing creates peace.

healing_modality.primary: Informing practice, honoring initiation impulses, alone time
practices: Create environments with freedom to initiate

spiritual_pathway.essence: Peace through proper use of power. Manifestors are here to initiate new directions.
spiritual_pathway.evolution: From anger (being controlled) → Peace (informing) → Power (initiating freely)
spiritual_pathway.transcendence: When Manifestor informs and initiates from clarity, they become pure creative force. Channel for new possibilities.
